name: Slippy Cube II
description:
Slippy Cube II

A game made by Caspar Nieuwland.
My second game ever made.

Slippy Cube is a game were you are a cube.
You try to goto the finish line but you dont know were it is.
The only thing you see is a nice road and dangerous blocks.
Can you make it to the end?

Controls:
A = Go Left
D = Go Right
Escape = Pause Menu
